entities.name: Walter (the subject of the alleged affair)

summary: Christine Scarlet and Walter Boddy started a romantic relationship approximately 3 weeks ago.

Information about Scott Plum's nationality confirmed.
Walter Boddy leaves conservatory, Christine Scarlet remains for 'second surprise'.
Scott Plum accuses Walter Boddy of scamming him out of $200,000 and having an affair with his ex-wife, but denies involvement in Boddy's death.
Christine Scarlet waited for Walter Boddy at a conservatory on June 4th, awaiting tickets and a surprise.

Walter Boddy and Adam Mustard had a second meeting to discuss purchasing Dalia Surveillance Equipment Company.
